text: Al-Ladhina Ya'kuluna Ar-Riba La Yaqumuna 'Illa Kama Yaqumu Al-Ladhi Yatakhabbatuhu Ash-Shaytanu Mina Al-Massi Dhalika Bi'annahum Qalu 'Innama Al-Bay`u Mithlu Ar-Riba Wa 'Ahalla Allahu Al-Bay`a Wa Harrama Ar-Riba Faman Ja'ahu Maw`izatun Min Rabbihi Fantaha Falahu Ma Salafa Wa 'Amruhu 'Ila Allahi Wa Man `Ada Fa'ula'ika 'Ashabu An-Nari Hum Fiha Khaliduna
